description.en: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.ar: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.br: Uma mística aura de Fogo aparecerá em seu personagem. Dura 15 dias.
description.cns: 你的角色上将会出现神秘的火焰光影特效，持续 15 天。
description.de: Eine mystische Feueraura wird deinen Charakter umgeben. Hält 15 Tage.
description.fi: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.fil: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.fr: Entoure votre personnage d'une aura mystique de feu pendant 15 jours.
description.id: Aura Api mistis akan muncul pada karakter Anda. Berlangsung selama 15 hari.
description.it: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.jp: 15日間、神秘的な火のオーラがあなたのキャラクターに現れます。
description.kr: 신비로운 파이어 아우라가 당신의 캐릭터 나타납니다. 15일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.pl: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.ru: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.sp: Una mística aura de Fuego aparecerá en tu personaje. Dura 15 días.
description.sw: A mystical Fire aura will appear on your character. Lasts 15 days.
description.th: ออร่าไฟลึกลับจะปรากฏขึ้นบนตัวละครของคุณ ใช้เวลา 15 วัน
description.tw: 神秘的火焰光輝圍繞在你身旁，持續15天
description.vi: Một hào quang Lửa thần bí sẽ xuất hiện trên nhân vật của bạn. Kéo dài 15 ngày.
